item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: RPM Trimmer Panel
item.description:
In addition to working on the tangential arm assembly, the RPM trimmer panel was also restored. Testing by Beolover has demonstrated that this upgrade reduces the heat affecting the platter motor control circuit and improves the motor’s stability. The original trimmer assembly is shown here with its two original lamps. The Beolover replacement LED lamp assemblies are designed to be connected to the same solder pads as the original lamps, eliminating the need for board modifications...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-rpm-trimmer-panel/
